Container.Name: icloud-drive-sync
Container.Overview:
This container will DOWNLOAD (not upload - yet) all your files / photos from iCloud. You can set filter for folder / types.
Download and edit the config and put it in your Config Path folder: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mandarons/icloud-drive-docker/main/config.yaml
After the installation connect to your container console and run: icloud --username=<icloud-username> --session-directory=/app/session_data (This will request your iCloud password and your 2 factor auth key).
